title: Stadion am Brentanobad
text: Stadion am Brentanobad is a multi-use <a href="stadium">stadium</a> in <a href="Frankfurt">Frankfurt</a>, <a href="Germany">Germany</a>. It is currently used mostly for <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> matches and is the home stadium of <a href="1.%20FFC%20Frankfurt">1. FFC Frankfurt</a> and <a href="Rot-Wei%C3%9F%20Frankfurt">Rot-Weiß Frankfurt</a>. The stadium has a capacity of 5,500 places.
